text: People en Espanol is a Spanish-language magazine published by Time Warner, Inc. that debuted in 1996 out of the success of the Selena tribute issue. As of 2006, it was the Spanish-language magazine of largest readership in the United States, reaching 4.2 million readers with each issue.http://www.echo- media.com/MediaDetail.asp?IDNumber=11357 People EN ESPAÑOL ==Notes== ==Other websites== * People en Español Official site * People en Español Media Kit Category:American magazines
title: People en Español
